item.title: US Mint in Philadelphia to press final penny as the 1-cent coin gets canceled
item.description: The U.S. Mint in Philadelphia is set to strike its last circulating penny as the president has canceled the 1-cent coin

item.title: Mentally ill people are stuck in jail because they can't get treatment. Here's what's to know
item.description: Fernando Clark spent the last 10 months of his life in an Alabama jail cell, waiting for court-ordered psychiatric treatment

item.title: Alabama promised to improve psychiatric care for men charged with crimes
item.description: Fernando Clark died in the Montgomery County Jail while waiting for psychiatric treatment
